modName: Dragon Priest Masks Moved to Slot 44
summary:
Moved all the Dragon Priest Masks to Slot 44.
<br/><br/>I also changed them to clothing with an Armour rating of 0.
<br/><br/>This should allow them to be worn with circlets and helmets, and prevent them from causing problems with perks.
descriptionHtml:
This is my very first mod!

I wanted to allow my character to use the masks with his other equipment, so I simply
moved all the Dragon Priest Masks to Slot 44.

<br/><br/>I also changed them to clothing with an Armour rating of 0.
<br/><br/>This should allow them to be worn with circlets and helmets, and prevent them from causing problems with perks.

Should work for Khajiit and Argonians as well.

Yes their is clipping. No I'm not going to do anything about it.

Also Includes optional Clavicus Vile and Dragonborn files.
author: NJGriffon
